section.heading: Adequate compliance with commercial contract.
section.text: Whether a document of title is adequate to fulfill the obligations of a contract for sale, a contract for lease, or the conditions of a letter of credit is determined by Article 2, 2A, or 5.

annoGroup.heading: Uniform Commercial Code Comment
annoGroup.text: Purposes: To cross-refer to the Articles of this Act which deal with the substantive issues of the type of document of title required under the contract entered into by the parties.
Definitional Cross References: “Contract for sale”. Section 2-106.
Prior Uniform Statutory Provision: Former Section 7-509.
Purposes: To cross-refer to the Articles of this Act which deal with the substantive issues of the type of document of title required under the contract entered into by the parties.
Definitional Cross References: “Contract for sale”. Section 2-106.

text.em: Warehouse Receipts and Bills of Lading: Miscellaneous Provisions.
